catalogue_description: Fihrist: Union Catalogue of Manuscripts from the Islamicate World
title: Qurʼān
description: Fragments in Kufic writing on vellum.
contents: Part 1: (i) xxx, 8-10; (ii) xxxiii, 21-23; (iii) xxxiii, 36, 37. Part 2: (i) xl, 53-85; (ii) xli, 1-30; (iii) xlv, 7-17. Part 3: (i) xxvi, 94-106; (ii) xxiii, 102-114. Part 4: (i) ix, 72, 73; (ii) ix, 58-60; (iii) ix, 78-81. Part 5: (i) xii, 96-111; (ii) xiii, 6-18. Part 6: (i) xxiii, 40-64; (ii) xxiv, 33-42; (iii) xviii, 53-110; (iv) xix, l-ii; (v) xxvi, 10-40; (vi) xxiii, 108-xxiv, 4.
